question.title: Print GeeksForGeeks
question.content:
Comment the code that outputs "Hello World", so that "GeeksForGeeks" gets printed.

Example: 

Output: "GeeksForGeeks"

rephrased.body: Modify the code that currently outputs "Hello World" so that it prints "GeeksForGeeks" instead.

testcases.explanation: The modified code should output "GeeksForGeeks" when executed.

testcases.input: Any code that initially prints "Hello World"
testcases.explanation: The task is to change the print statement or logic to display "GeeksForGeeks".

solutions.full_func:
#Back-end complete function Template for Python 3
# Prints Hello World
# print("Hello World")
# Prints GeeksForGeeks
print("GeeksForGeeks")
